import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import './navbar.css' import logo from '../assets/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../assets/cart_icon.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export const Navbar = () => { const {amount} = useContext(ShopContext); const [menu,setMenu] = useState("Shop"); return (
